topic.title: Frequently used DOS line-command utilites integrated into UI

body.p: The line command utilities such as OtmExp2TMX.exe or OtmMtEval.exe etc. are now integrated into the workbench, and can be directly envoked from within . This frees users from remembering long and complex command line syntnax calls.
The new function is called via "Utilities" --> "GUI for command line tools" inside the workbench.
